p:
Furthermore, we found in DEMS and RRDE measurements a dependency of the half‐wave potential on electrode roughness as predicted by theory and showed a further RRDE approach to obtain reasonable values for the apparent transfer coefficient (
α
a p p
). Using this approach combined with the Tafel slopes we conclude an initial, equilibrated one electron process followed by a slow process (e. g., slow formation of the
C a O
2
+
ion pair). This proves the electrode roughness to be a valuable tool for investigations on kinetics.
